titleStmt.title: A perfect narrative of the particular service performed by Thomas Wright firemaster with a morter-peice [sic] of fifteen inches and a half diameter, against the Castle of Elizabeth in the Isle of Jersey, being commanded thither by order of the Councell of State, under the command of Coll: James Haine, humbly represented to the honorable Councell of State.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, gunner.

titleStmt.title: A perfect narrative of the particular service performed by Thomas Wright firemaster with a morter-peice [sic] of fifteen inches and a half diameter, against the Castle of Elizabeth in the Isle of Jersey, being commanded thither by order of the Councell of State, under the command of Coll: James Haine, humbly represented to the honorable Councell of State.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, gunner.

notesStmt.note: Imprint place from Wing; imprint date suggested by text (Wing gives 1651).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
